title: Teemo as a weapon in Ranked.
body: People in ranked queues, as soon as something doesn't go their way they lock in  Teemo, with revive and clarity, please riot, could you do something to make it so that I don't have to dodge a series, because someone just wants to troll, I have a 30 minute lockout, because I dodged a normal with the same exact thing earlier today, apparently the system punishes me for not subjecting 4 people to one person's being a tool.

replies.body:
>they lock in Teemo, with revive and clarity

That's rather specific. If a situation arises where someone isn't happy with what's happened, then someone should try and find a solution that makes everyone happy. And I'm not necessarily saying that it has to be leaded by you. In fact, I reckon that you leaving the queue could be more detrimental than attempting to play a fun game.
